ygData.subject: Re: Trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: They seemed to have nerfed tinkering like they did jewerly. Before the skill cap for jewelry was about 250-300 I think. But I know for sure it was able to go
ygData.messageBody:
They seemed to have nerfed tinkering like they did jewerly. Before the skill
cap for jewelry was about 250-300 I think. But I know for sure it was able
to go above 200. So what happened is that people could make more plat items
because of less failures and lowerprices. They didn't like all the plat
items going around so they nerfed the skill to a 200 cap. So now it takes
10-15 tries to make the higher end plat jewelery.

When you do try to make rebreathers or aqualungs try to get your wis as high
as possable because thats the stats that helps you fail less.

-Dave

At 08:35 PM 11/23/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: jeff@...
>
>Just to let ya know my Tinkering Skill is at 125
>and neither the Aqualung or the Rebreather is Trivial at that lvl.
>The fail rate has not seemed to change much either.
>With a Int or 200 and Wis of 145 I still fail 40% of the time on the
>aqualungs and 60 to 70 % on the rebreathers. As for the Gemcutter
>would love to find the Diamond Dust.
>
>Winkin -= The Rathe =-
>
>>
>
